topic.title: Procedures Section Entries Optional2 - conformance rules

section.p: This section describes all interventional, surgical, diagnostic, or therapeutic procedures or treatments pertinent to the patient historically at the time the document is generated. The section should include notable procedures, but can contain all procedures for the period of time being summarized. The common notion of "procedure" is broader than that specified by the HL7 Version 3 Reference Information Model (RIM), therefore this section contains procedure templates represented with three RIM classes: Act, Observation, and Procedure. Procedure Activity Procedure (V2) is for procedures that alter the physical condition of a patient (e.g., splenectomy). Procedure Activity Observation (V2) is for procedures that result in new information about a patient but do not cause physical alteration (e.g., EEG). Procedure Activity Act (V2) is for all other types of procedures (e.g., dressing change).

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-6270, CONF:1098-6271, CONF:1098-32532) ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.7"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Procedures Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.7)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15423)/@code="47519-4" History of Procedures (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15424, CONF:1098-31139)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-6274, CONF:1098-15509)
Conforms to Procedure Activity Procedure2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14:2014-06-09)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-6278, CONF:1098-15510)
Conforms to Procedure Activity Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.13:2014-06-09)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-8533, CONF:1098-15511)
Conforms to Procedure Activity Act2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.12:2014-06-09)
SHALL conform to Procedures Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.7)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15423)/@code="47519-4" History of Procedures (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15424, CONF:1098-31139)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:17184, R2.0=CONF:1098-17184)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:6273, R2.0=CONF:1098-6273)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-6274, CONF:1098-15509)
Conforms to Procedure Activity Procedure2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14:2014-06-09)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-6278, CONF:1098-15510)
Conforms to Procedure Activity Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.13:2014-06-09)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-8533, CONF:1098-15511)
Conforms to Procedure Activity Act2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.12:2014-06-09)
